content: Lastly, don’t be too stressed about the the interview. I know, this is easier said than done. Even I always stress out about the result. I mean who wouldn’t right? Well you know, what is done is done and sometimes in life, you don’t always get what you want. That’s why living as a human being is very interesting because life is like a rollercoaster — there are times when you struggle but that’s what makes us stronger.
